Description.value:
This patch let this A19(?) mod https://www.nexusmods.com/7daystodie/mods/569 work again. You will have a tactical advantage by knowing where the enemies are. TODO: consume energy, shock enemies, explode on failure
IMPORTANT: 1) You need to remove 'ModInfo' open and close xml tags from original mod ModInfo.xml. 2) You need to disable/delete original mod entityclasses.xml.
Tip(linux): use this geany edit format command to prettify original xml files: xmlindent -i 2 -f

DependsOn.help: TODO: ask devs to create this xml tag
